job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Pandora
job.description: SiriusXM and Pandora have joined together to create the leading audio entertainment company in the US Together we are uniquely positioned to lead a new era of audio entertainment by delivering the most compelling subscription and adsupported audio experiences to millions of listeners  in the car at home and on the go Our talent content technology and innovation continue to be at the forefront and we want you to be a part of it Check out our current openings below and at wwwsiriusxmcomcareers brbrstronguPosition SummarybrbrustrongSiriusXM is seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join our Metadata Delivery Team Our team focuses on analyzing talk and music content using machine learning methods driven by our science and analyst teams We are responsible for making this highly data available at listener scale using a hybrid cloud approachbrbrstronguDuties And Responsibilitiesbrustrongulli Coding in Java Scala or Python lili Mentor team members on engineering best practices lili Analyze requirements and technical specifications and implement assigned development tasks using various technologies lili Be familiar with the overall software stack and the software components liulstrong Supervisory Responsibilities brstrongulli None liulstrong Minimum Qualifications brstrongulli BS in Computer Science or equivalent lili 5 years of Software DeveloperSoftware Engineer experience liulstrong Requirements and General Skills brstrongulli Good public speaking and presentation skills lili Interpersonal skills and ability to interact and work with staff at all levels lili Excellent written and verbal communication skills lili Ability to work independently and in a team environment lili Ability to pay attention to details and be organized lili Ability to project professionalism over the phone and in person lili Ability to handle multiple tasks in a fastpaced environment lili Commitment to internal client and customer service principles lili Willingness to take initiative and to follow through on projects lili Creative writing ability lili Excellent time management skills with the ability to prioritize and multitask and work under shifting deadlines in a fastpaced environment lili Must have legal right to work in the US liulstrong Technical Skills brstrongulli Thorough knowledge of a modern software development process will be required lili The role will demand an understanding in modern testing and deployment best practices lili Knowledge of data structures and run time efficiencies will play a key role in contributing to our teams codebase
